title: How to Make a Bathroom a Steamroom

steps.headline: Turn the shower on as hot as possible.
Put the lid down on the toilet; sit there.
Do not enter the scalding hot water.

text: Turn the shower on as hot as possible.  Open the shower curtain.  Close the door.  Put the lid down on the toilet; sit there. Relax and enjoy the steam. Do not enter the scalding hot water. Sit away from the sources.
